news_header: This article reviews the top-performing Canadian mining stocks and discusses recent economic developments in Canada and the US, including job growth and trade agreements.
news_original_title: Top 5 Canadian Mining Stocks This Week: Orosur Jumps 92 Percent on Assays
news_text: The Investing News Network provides a weekly overview of the best-performing Canadian mining stocks on the TSX, TSXV, and CSE, highlighting recent economic news affecting the resource sector. Key developments include a trade agreement between the US, Canada, and Mexico that delayed tariffs, positive job reports from both countries, and significant gains in mining stocks. The article details the performance of various mining companies, including Orosur Mining, Almonty Industries, and Blue Lagoon Resources, among others, and their respective projects and market activities.
